name: Color Time!
description:
Move with the arrow keys or A/D and jump with spacebar. Jump to push the key!

Complete puzzles by getting a key to the door, but be aware, you can change color, and each color behaves differently!

One of my best games from 2021!

This one hurts specially, the game has huge abandoned potential, but to continue it i would need to redo everything thanks to unity, so for now, it wil be as is.

Hope you enjoy it!
